title: Red 2 2013 CAM NEW SOURCE XViD - JUSTiCE
description:
Red 2 2013 CAM NEW SOURCE XViD - JUSTiCE



SOURCE : VIDEO - 1080p high THXS   AUDIO - Old justice cam release,unsure of audio source 


Video and audio both cleaned and given justice.
Check sample and see.....


Ok video source was slightly cropped,subs were in german,video was washed out and colours,contrast all over the place,oh and was oos.


WORKDONE -

First off retail is due end of nov so i guess around first/second week of Nov there should be a brrip out....however i still opted to do this as i like
a challenge,like to see what i can do to the video.
First off made a script and added resize and denoise to the script.Also at this staged removed the audio.
Now i dropped the video into vdub and tweaked the contrast,brightness,sharpness,rgb colours etc....and encoded it to xvid.
Audio i syncd from the old cam release we did...needed 9 cuts and it might slip by 100ms here and there but skimmed through and looks ok too me.


Overall for a cam ....v6.5 a6,if you can wait,then wait ...if not enjoy folks.
